testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of orange application
testcase.name: To validate the login functionality with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in orange homepage and has to fill "Admin" and "admin123" and click the login buttons.passed When The user click recruitment page........................................passed When The user click add button..............................................passed When The user has to fill fullname "LakshmiPriya"...........................passed And The user has to fill lastname "Jaisankar"...............................passed When The user has to choose the vacancy buttons.............................passed When The user has to fill email id "priya9876@gmail.com"....................passed When The user has to fill contact number "987654321"........................passed And The user has to scrolldown..............................................passed When The user has to click the "save" button................................passed

testcase.name: To validate the create claim request
testcase.skipped: Given The user should be in orange homepage and has to fill "Admin" and "admin123" and click the login buttons.passed When The user has to be in the claim module and able to click the Assign claim.passed Then The user has to fill the employee name , event and currency and click the create button.passed And The user has to add their expenses type and amount "50000" and click submit.passed Then The user can view the claims in the Employee claims....................undefined
